mapper.select: select rowNum, userid, name, hp, email, req_key, req_auth, req_date, req_status, confirm_date FROM (select m.userid, m.name, m.hp, m.email, a.req_key, a.req_auth, a.req_date, a.req_status, a.confirm_date from user_authreq_tbl a JOIN user_member_tbl m ON a.userid=m.userid WHERE a.req_division = #{req_division} AND a.req_key = #{req_key}) WHERE userid = #{userid}
mapper.delete: delete user_authreq_tbl WHERE userid = #{userid} AND req_key = #{req_key} AND req_division = #{req_division}
